= Add an Application to the SPGateway
:page-layout: post
:page-category: Tutorials

== Introduction

The purpose of this tutorial is to walk through the process of setting up a sample header application with Oracle IDP through the SPGateway Admin console.

[NOTE]
====
* Admin login for SPGateway Admin console
* SPGateway appliance configured with Oracle IDCS tenant
* Access to local hosts file
====

== Create an Application in SPGateway
